zh-CN.heroTitle: 甄选海量精品货源 欧美海外仓一件代发
zh-CN.heroDescription: 深圳赛盈网络有限公司，是专注于为供应商及分销商双向赋能的跨境电商分销B2B平台，通过整合谷仓海外仓、云途专线物流等优质供应链资源，帮助工厂及品牌供应商扩展海外销售；同时也为Amazon、eBay、Walmart及Shopify等平台的国内外卖家提供海外仓货源一件代发服务，解决卖家遇到的选品难、资金有限、海外仓服务门槛高、售后难等系列经营难题，现已支持美国、英国、德国、法国、加拿大等国家分销。
zh-CN.reasonsTitle: 加入赛盈一件代发分销平台的六大理由
zh-CN.reason1Description: 这里有那些年，你发不动的大货！
zh-CN.reason1Item5: 支持非普货类及大件类产品海外仓直发
zh-CN.reason2Title: "0"库存运营模式 解放资金压力，降低库存风险
zh-CN.reason2Item1: 一件代发，先出单后付款
zh-CN.reason2Item3: 零成本搭建跨境供应链体系
zh-CN.reason3Title: 9大海外仓服务 24小时出单号，2-8天妥投
zh-CN.reason3Item4: 快速缩短回款周期，提升资金周转率
zh-CN.reason4Item1: 专业客服团队，快速响应
zh-CN.reason4Item4: 退换货便捷，极速处理售后问题
zh-CN.reason5Description: 大量减少工作量，实现智能化管理
zh-CN.reason5Item1: 无技术开发团队分销商：赛盈现已支持Amazon及Shopify店铺商品一键刊登功能；并支持Amazon、eBay、Wish、Shopify等平台店铺账号与赛盈系统绑定，可实现订单加载、库存同步、自动上传跟踪号等功能。
zh-CN.reason5Item2: 拥有技术开发团队分销商：可通过赛盈公共API接口，实现商品管理、订单管理、账户管理等诸多功能。
zh-CN.reason6Item1: 专业产品服务，定制化推荐
zh-CN.reason6Item2: 协助管理库存，提升库存稳定性

en.heroTitle: Carefully Selected High-Quality Products, European and American Overseas Warehouse Drop Shipping
en.heroDescription: Shenzhen Saleyee Network Co., Ltd. is a cross-border e-commerce B2B distribution platform dedicated to empowering both suppliers and distributors. By integrating high-quality supply chain resources such as Gucang overseas warehouses and Yuntu Logistics, we help factories and brand suppliers expand their overseas sales. We also provide overseas warehouse sourcing and drop-shipping services for domestic and international sellers on platforms such as Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and Shopify, solving operational challenges such as product selection difficulties, limited capital, high overseas warehouse service thresholds, and after-sales issues. We currently support distribution in the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Canada, and other countries.
en.loginButton: Already have an account? Log in
en.reasonsTitle: Six Reasons to Join Saleyee Drop Shipping Distribution Platform
en.reason1Description: Here are those big items you couldn't ship in the past!
en.reason1Item5: Support for non-standard and large item direct shipping from overseas warehouses
en.reason2Title: "Zero" Inventory Operation Model, Free Up Capital Pressure, Reduce Inventory Risk
en.reason2Item1: Drop shipping, payment after order placement
en.reason2Item2: No need to stock, no inventory risk
en.reason2Item3: Zero-cost cross-border supply chain system setup
en.reason3Title: 9 Major Overseas Warehouse Services, Order Numbers in 24 Hours, Delivery in 2-8 Days
en.reason3Item2: Support for full tracking with Fedex, UPS, USPS and other logistics
en.reason3Item3: Meet Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Shopify logistics timeliness requirements
en.reason3Item4: Rapidly shorten collection cycle, improve capital turnover rate
en.reason4Description: After-sales rate <2%, quick return and exchange
en.reason4Item1: Professional customer service team, fast response
en.reason4Item2: Up to 60 days after-sales service period
en.reason4Item4: Convenient returns and exchanges, rapid after-sales issue resolution
en.reason5Description: Significantly reduce workload, achieve intelligent management
en.reason5Item1: Distributors without technical development teams: Saleyee now supports one-click product listing for Amazon and Shopify store products; and supports binding of Amazon, eBay, Wish, Shopify and other platform store accounts with the Saleyee system, enabling order loading, inventory synchronization, automatic tracking number upload and other functions.
en.reason5Item2: Distributors with technical development teams: Through Saleyee's public API interface, various functions such as product management, order management, and account management can be achieved.
en.reason6Item2: Assist with inventory management, improve inventory stability
